description: A four-game road trip officially kicks off tonight as the Ducks (3-3-1, 7 points) take on the Philadelphia Flyers (5-3-0, 10 points) at Wells Fargo Center.

name: Anaheim Ducks

caption: nhl.com
description: Ducks right wing Patrick Eaves is currently resting comfortably in stable condition at Hoag Hospital in Newport Beach after being diagnosed with what is suspected to be Guillain-Barré syndrome, a disorder in which the body's immune system attacks the peripheral nervous system.
message: NEWS: An update on Patrick Eaves' condition.
name: Anaheim Ducks

description: Hampus Lindholm will make his eagerly awaited season debut tomorrow night against the Philadelphia Flyers in the opener of a four-game road trip out East.

caption: The Mighty Ducks Screening
description:
The 25th Anniversary of @[11784025953:274:Disney]'s #TheMightyDucks movie will be screening at the historic @[18253106371:274:The El Capitan Theatre] Throwback Thursday tonight in Hollywood at 7pm.

A panel of original cast members, producers and Guy Hebert will start the show.
message:
The 25th Anniversary of Disney's #TheMightyDucks movie will be screening at the historic The El Capitan Theatre Throwback Thursday tonight in Hollywood at 7pm.

A panel of original cast members, producers and Guy Hebert will start the show.
name: Anaheim Ducks

description:
“The S.C.O.R.E. program has brought our community together-students, parents, and teachers. We've seen that hockey is the great equalizer. It doesn't matter if you're young or old, male or female-and regardless of your athleticism-hockey is easily accessible and everyone tends to love it.” - Kurt Koerth, Beechwood Elementary 

https://www.nhl.com/ducks/news/ducks-teach-the-teachers-at-score-street-hockey-seminar/c-291857162

description:
Quack. Quack. Quack.

Hockey-loving Margot Robbie shares the story of the time she walked around NYC in the Flying V formation.
message: And the award for our new favorite actress goes to...
name: Anaheim Ducks

description:
Jonathan Smith, a true hero, was shot helping people during the Las Vegas shooting before being shot himself. He was able to save 30 lives that night.

 Anaheim Ducks Kent French NHL #VegasStrong
message: An incredible story of a truly heroic individual.
name: Anaheim Ducks

caption: nhl.com
description: 'They went out of their way to reach out, not just to myself but to the others who are here,' says Jonathan Smith, a gunshot victim and hero that night.
message: "It feels really good to be back, it feels really good to be in jerseys, it feels really good to see sports again."
name: Anaheim Ducks

message:
#DucksWin! The #NHLDucks close the homestand with a win over the New York Islanders. Patrick Eaves, making his season debut, scored the game-winning goal!

message: Tonight, we are humbled to honor those from the OC area who were injured or performed heroically as first responders in the Vegas tragedy. Together, we are all #VegasStrong.
name: Anaheim Ducks
